runkoserver.controller

Class AreaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • runkoserver.controller.AreaController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/area")
public class AreaController
extends Object
    Controller class for HTTP requests related to Area objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getArea

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=GET)
public String getArea(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                 @PathVariable
                                                                                 Long id,
                                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                 Principal principal)
        GET-method for rendering a view with the information of a specific Area.
        Parameters:
        redirectAttributes - Spring object for redirect attributes
        id - the id of the Area whose information will be shown
        model - model object for Spring to use
        principal - Spring object that knows who is logged in
        Returns:
        path to the html file that shows Area information

      • areaForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/areaform",
                method=GET)
public String areaForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                      Principal principal)
        GET-method for rendering the form to create new Areas.
        Parameters:
        model - model object for Spring to use
        principal - tells who is logged in.
        Returns:
        path to the area creation form html file

      • postArea

        @RequestMapping(value="/areaform",
                method=POST)
public String postArea(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                       Long ownerId,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                       String name,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                       Boolean visibility)
        POST-method to create a new Area.
        Parameters:
        redirectAttributes - a Spring object to carry attributes from this method to the one that the user is next redirected to
        ownerId - tells who owns area
        name - Area's title
        visibility - tells if area is public or not
        Returns:
        the URL path that the user will be redirected to

      • areaEditForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/edit/{id}",
                method=GET)
public String areaEditForm(@PathVariable
                                                                                           Long id,
                                                                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET-method for rendering the form to modify an existing Area.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Area that will be edited
        model - object for spring to use
        Returns:
        path to the content creation form html file

      • updateArea

        @RequestMapping(value="/edit/{id}",
                method=POST)
public String updateArea(@PathVariable
                                                                                          Long id,
                                                                                          org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                          String name,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=true)
                                                                                          boolean visibility,
                                                                                          Principal principal)
        POST-method to update an existing Area.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Area to be modified
        redirectAttributes - a Spring object to carry redirect attributes
        name - Area's name
        visibility - Area's visibility
        principal - Spring object that knows who is logged in
        Returns:
        redirect URL to front page

      • deleteArea

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=DELETE)
public String deleteArea(@PathVariable
                                                                                       Long id,
                                                                                       org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                       Principal principal)
        Deletes an Area if the currently logged in user is the Area's owner.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Area to be deleted
        redirectAttributes - a Spring object to carry redirect attributes
        principal - Spring object that knows who is logged in
        Returns:
        redirect URL to front page

      • subscribeArea

        @RequestMapping(value="/{id}",
                method=POST)
public String subscribeArea(@PathVariable
                                                                                        Long id,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                        String whereICome,
                                                                                        Principal principal,
                                                                                        org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        POST-method to subscribe the currently logged in user to an Area.
        Parameters:
        id - which area is subscripted or unsubscripted
        whereICome - tells which URL we should redirect
        principal - Spring object that knows who is logged in
        redirectAttributes - Spring object for redirect attributes
        Returns:
        redirect URL to either content manager or Area page
